item.title: Man who opened fire outside a Michigan church had attended services there with his mom, pastor says
item.description: The pastor of a Michigan church where a gunman was struck by a vehicle and fatally shot by security staff says the man had attended services a few tim...

item.title: SCOTUS to hear case of Rastafarian whose dreadlocks were shaved by prison guards

item.title: US stocks open with small losses and the price of oil is up slightly as markets watch for Iran's response to US strike

item.title: 6 reported dead and 2 missing after a boat capsizes on Lake Tahoe in California
item.description: Officials say six people were confirmed dead and two others were missing after a boat capsized on Lake Tahoe in California
